storyInfo: Weapons are cast aside and the ceremony proceeds smoothly. Much has changed in Kjerag, which will undoubtedly see more and increasingly complex challenges. The monstrosity in the underground factory signifies that Kjerag is ready.

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier
Victorian Soldier
attributes.content: Is it over? Did we win?

attributes.name: Victorian Soldier
attributes.content: Ouch!
Good, at least you can still feel your arm.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Now get up if you're still alive.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Ouch! Take it easy, Charles!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Enough fooling around. Harold has enough work to do without you adding to it.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Get to the lakeside if you can still walk. Patch yourselves up if you can.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: I need a few volunteers to help me carry the ones that can't get up themselves.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: I'll come with you, Jefferson.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Just say it if you don't want that leg of yours anymore. We can have Harold make one for you.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: God's wounds, I can't believe everyone's still breathing after all that. What a bloody miracle.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Could it really be Kjeragandr's protection?
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Isn't it the other way round? A thousand against one, and she's still breathing...
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Maybe it really is Kjeragandr's protection.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: It's not.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjeragandr is kind and watchful, but this result is not the result of Her power.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That no one lost their life here is a miracle that we created together.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That's what I believe.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Y-You're the Saintess of Kjerag?
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Your words honor us more than we deserve.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: What are your instructions?
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: I wouldn't call it instructions, per se.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Just an invitation to attend the post-ceremony banquet, as is the place of the host.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: After all, aren't you here in Kjerag for the ceremony?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...I thought exile would be the best-case scenario.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: We're allowed to participate in the banquet?
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Would you rather be here for the banquet, or admit that you're here for a 'military operation' and go to prison?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Uhm.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Go on, be my guest.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Everything is ready. The banquet can begin at any tie.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Thank you, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Why thank me?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No particular reason... just wanted to thank you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjerag will become a better place, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: There will come a day when people from the outside will know more than just Karlan Trade, see more than just the snow, mountains and valleys.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: They will know that there is a country here by the name of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: A respectable country with its unique culture and customs, where its people live in prosperity.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sounds great.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You sure you don't need 'a little help', Enya?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Without that, you wouldn't have any rainbows.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's blessing reaches into the heart because of how precious it is.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If we ask Kjeragandr for a miracle for every little thing, then what's left is not religion, but reliance.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: When you start to take something for granted, that's when you stop respecting it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Things are fine the way it is.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Let's just hope Kjeragandr doesn't get angry at me for thinking this way.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hah, don't worry, Enya.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Nothing makes a mother happier than to see her child start to walk on its own two feet.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'm done, Mr. Silverash.
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: This is my first outdoor speech. Are you sure this is going to work?
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: It was perfect, Mr. Mob.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your voice was filled with passion. No one could pick a flaw in it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Even though you declined my offer to have someone magnify your voice with Originium Arts, the amplification device that you used performed above and beyond expectations.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Is this your company's new product?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This amplifier?
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: No, of course not. It's good, but the market for amplifiers is cornered by a few big companies. There's no place for us there... ahem. Forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: I've heard about corporate competition in Kazimierz. You didn't say anything that I didn't know.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So, what is it that you're using?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A gift from a friend I met on the train.
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: They probably thought it was just a toy.
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: Who could have thought that it would come in so handy when Mr. Silverash made that abrupt request?
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Mr. Mob, Karlan Trade would very much love for our cooperation to extend beyond this one time.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I will have someone take you around Kjerag for the next few days, including tours of our mines and factories.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Please accept this as a token of my sincerity.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I believe Kjerag will not disappoint you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They stopped. They really stopped.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's like you said. That man in a suit opens his mouth, and both sides stop fighting before long!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I thought we were in for a real fight. Didn't SilverAsh tell you guys to get here quick?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But it was all over in an instant.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Why did the Victorians and Kjerags stop fighting as soon as he arrived?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.options: Because he's a spokesman for the Kazimierz General Chamber of Commerce.

attributes.content: Who...? Is that really important?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, wait, I know!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The important thing is that he's from Kazimierz, isn't it?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Victoria wants to bully Kjerag for its own interests, but they have to be careful when it comes to Kazimierz, who's also here for its own interests... I think something like this came up in one of Anna's tests.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So... is this why SilverAsh contacted you and Muelsyse?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're his backup plan?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.options: You're learning, Leto.;We don't need it now, though.

attributes.content: No wonder you were in such a hurry.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Stuff like this is a pain.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But how did you know that the man in the suit was a spokesman for... hm, for what again?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You know him?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.options: We've met.;His appearance has changed, but his voice hasn't.

attributes.content: Oh yeah, you and Amiya went to Kazimierz for a while.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I want to go with Mamochka, if I get the chance.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: There are a few knights I really like. They're so cool!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Appearance... voice?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I guess his voice was pretty unusual. It was really loud.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't know how he did it. I could hear him all the way from here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh yeah, Doctor.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Did you give him something at the station?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.options: A little toy that Closure made.;Just a little help.

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Somehow, I can't help but think there's more than meets the eye.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh... Muelsyse is chatting with someone.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Should we go over?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You have people you know here too, don't you, Sharp?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm working right now.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: The one who invited me is probably a little too busy right now.
Taking in the view here isn't such a bad idea.

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll stay with you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.options: I don't think that's going to work.
There's someone waiting for you there.

attributes.content: For me? Who? Oh...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: HIM.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, there really isn't anything I want to say to him..
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Arrggghhh! This sucks!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sorry, Doctor, Sharp, give me a minute!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll be back soon!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You got something to say, spit it out.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Otherwise, I've got places to be.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I just wanted to make sure that you're safe.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I couldn't come find you in that chaos.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The Victorians weren't looking for me. Even that Trilby Asher guy is no match for Sharp and the Doctor.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That bastard's still after you?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't think so. It didn't look like he was here for me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, he's lucky he ran away. Sharp and I would have given him a nice little beating.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't underestimate a Trilby Asher.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't like their methods either, but the Trilby Ashers are a big deal.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Him? Didn't seem like he was anything special.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That's because Enciodes has Degenbrecher to keep him down!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: A warrior must never underestimate an enemy, Rosalind.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Alright, you done then? I gotta go.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Three.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Two.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: R-Rosalind!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: ...I spent a lot of time thinking about it last night.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I was weak back then.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The days with your mother were like honey. I couldn't keep myself from thinking about her. I couldn't keep myself away from her, from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I dragged you and Tatyana into that mess, but abandoned you when I couldn't handle the pressure...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You were right to yell at me, Rosalind.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Whatever I say now won't be anything more than an excuse.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: For more than a decade, my memory has tried to justify it.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It whitewashes the memories for a man too weak to face his own weaknesses, so that he can continue to feel safe, continue to run away.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: He lied so much he even fooled himself.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's my fault.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I deserve to be scolded and scorned by you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And I can't blame you for being disappointed in me and Kjerag...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I let you and your mother down.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: There's one thing I want to make clear.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mamochka never said anything bad about Kjerag.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Or about my papa.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She even taught me how to pray to Kjeragandr, even though I never really believed in it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mamochka only ever said good things about this place.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Tatyana... she doesn't hate Kjerag?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Why would I lie?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I told you, didn't I? She said my papa was really handsome.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Of course, I'm having doubts about that now.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It was before I started in with the beard. Tatyana did say she liked my face...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wait, why did she tell you all this... could it be...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Could it be that she doesn't blame me?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't get too ahead of yourself.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't count on other people not blaming you, if you know you're wrong.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But it's exhausting to live with hatred. You underestimate Mamochka, if you thought she would spend a decade hating you and Kjerag.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're not worth it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're right...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's not worth it to live in pain for a man like me.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's all for the better...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Good, you get it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I didn't know who my papa was, and now I do. But that's all there is to it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I don't need recognition from your family. Paleroche business is none of my business.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm the daughter of Tatyana Yevgenyevna Larina.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm Rosalind Tatyanovna Larina, codename Leto. Remember that.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It was Tatyana who named you. Rosalind Tatyanovna Larina... rolls more smoothly off the tongue than Paleroche.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Leto... not bad, not bad. A nice codename.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: At least you have taste.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh yeah.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: This is for you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: A... bank account?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Child support for all these years. The amount is in the back. I rounded it down for you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Please make the transfer at your earliest convenience.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ch-Child support?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I said it yesterday, didn't I?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Living expenses, tuition, medical bills, emotional damages for a deadbeat dad... it's all there.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Gotta go.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: W-Wait, Rosalind!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The... the currency conversion might take some time. I-I'll find someone to take care of it as soon as possible!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Please, can I see Tatyana one more time? Just once...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: In your dreams!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is this your will too, Kjeragandr?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: The matters of the world are beyond a mere mortal's ability to predict...
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Master?
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Why are you standing all the way up front? There's nothing to see in particular...
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Just passing by.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: You said you just became a grandfather the last time you came to pray, Lucas?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: My son's daughter. Good thing she looks like her mother.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: That foreign woman my son insisted on marrying. From what's-the-name... Siracusa! Fierce woman, that.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Well, at least the kid of mine got a taker.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Were you against the marriage?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: What's the point, if the young ones are in love?
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: I might have said a word or two in my younger days.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: But now? Just let them be.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: You said you wanted a warding stone for your granddaughter, didn't you?
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Hoping that some of Kjeragandr and the Saintess's blessings would rub off, you know.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: You can have this.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: Th-This mark... it's a stone blessed by the Saintess herself?
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Th-That's too precious for someone like me, Master!
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Take it. Consider it a welcome gift for your granddaughter as she comes into this world.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: I'll pray to Kjeragandr that the children of Kjerag can grow up without illness, pain, or sorrow.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Elder Devotee

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Paleroche Commoner

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The Black Knight is definitely more than just a name. To think she wasn't even trying to kill...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A little too much for old bones like mine.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sir, your injuries...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier?

attributes.content: Just a scratch.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Don't want to miss the Saintess's banquet, after all.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's not every day that I get to be called 'sir' by you, though.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I think I just lost my appetite, for some reason.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: My condolences concerning your appetite, My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I will report the facts of your performance in Kjerag and the changes in the situation to the Duke.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm confident that I did nothing to displease Her Grace.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What about you, Trilby Asher?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The waters of Londinium you could muddle, but Kjerag gives you little room to maneuver.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: No need to worry about me, My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I have complete the mission assigned to me by Her Grace.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Kjerag is not worth devoting too much time and effort to, but there are elements that require the Duke's attention.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: We thought it was Karlan Trade, or Kjerag's geographical advantages as a natural fortress and commerce hub...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Seems like Her Grace is truly grounded... or visionary?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Are you here to visit the true form of Kjeragandr?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Her Grace wants to know whether Kjeragandr truly exists in Kjerag.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: In times of crisis, will Kjeragandr really help Her people?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Interesting.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And your conclusion?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I do not recommend that the Duke confront Kjerag militarily at this time.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Seeing the Kazimierzian corporations that publicly entered into partnership with Karlan Trade, I also ran into a Columbian scientist on the way here...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Force is not the smart plan.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Winning is easy, making money is hard. We're not Ursine. It's not worth it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It's not every day that we agree with each other.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Did you hit your head or something?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Like you, I'm a pacifist.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Eww...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Just talk like you normally do. Please.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If it saves some time and effort.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Are you familiar with this little trinket?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A burdenbeast blind box, they're all the rage right now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Why would you buy this?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Well, that's not important. Open it up and let's see what's inside.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've got a full set, but I'm missing the limited-edition secret version.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: No one knows what the box holds until it's opened.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The mystery is what makes it alluring. Perhaps I shouldn't open it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Well, are you going to open it or not?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'll have it, if you're not going to open it.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'll open it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hm? What's this?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What did you find? Let me see... mother of mercy!
attributes.name: Harold
Harold
attributes.content: This is...

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: Frozen crystal burdenbeast! Secret limited edition!
What kind of luck is that? I've been opening these boxes since the first day I arrived in Kjerag, and I've never gotten this one!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr, this is not fair!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Trilby Asher, we're both in Her Grace's employ. Do you think you could...?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm afraid not, My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I must stay in Kjerag for a while longer after submitting my report.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Thanks to you, I just realized that... collecting burdenbeast accessories isn't such a bad pastime after all.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Can you stand?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Not dead yet. I'll be fine in a few days.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gnosis?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: He went down first.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He says he's footing the bill tonight.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He has lousy taste. Pick for him.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You've been walking around in circles there for ages. You got something to say, out with it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm thinking that my debt to you seems to keep growing, from Kazimierz to here.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: One that I don't see a way to repay.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're afraid I'd jump ship?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It would be a big loss.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You want to repay me?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Name your price. Gnosis will find a way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: All I did was follow an arrogant young man to these bleak frozen hills ten years ago on a whim, a place where the temperature hovers around freezing on the warmest days.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Life here didn't turn out to be so bad, so I started doing what I could.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What does any of that have to do with you, Enciodes?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I guess you're right.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You stayed for the land, not for me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I didn't think I would hear it from your own mouth.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And don't put on that act about owing me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Tell the truth. What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm thinking...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There will come a day when people from the outside will know more than just Karlan Trade, see more than just the snow, mountains and valleys.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They'll remember the name 'Kjerag'.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Don't get too excited.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You may have won this round, but at the end of the day you've just gotten yourself even more tough customers.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Should I thank you for bringing Kazimierz back to me?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enciodes stays silent for a moment, then picks up a broken piece of ice from the ground and points it at the sun.
The ice is dauntingly cold, but it glitters under the sun, almost glaringly.
Yes. Kazimierz has come, Columbia is coming.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Things will only get more complicated.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can't win every time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Have you ever lost?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That's too bad. You must never have met an opponent like me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Come with Gnosis to the Tschäggättä's training grounds. I'll take both of you on at the same time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: One hand tied behind my back.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Haha. Gnosis is actually not bad with a sword.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're in a good mood.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's all done.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Three years of perseverance have borne fruit at last.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We broke things wide open. Caster is no longer an existential threat.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The independence of Kjerag is no longer a pipe dream.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In order words, you've drawn the attention of both arrogant Victorian nobles and unscrupulous Kazimierz merchants.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Soon to be joined by scientists with no qualms about moral or ethics.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Even more people will hate you for bringing even more chaos to this country.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Let them.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I don't care.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All I care is—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Excuse me—
attributes.name: Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: Are you the Black Knight?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: So it's true! The Black Knight is in Kjerag!
attributes.name: Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: It's really the Black Knight! This makes it all worth it!
attributes.name: Campaign Knight B

attributes.content: And you... you're the president of Karlan Trade, aren't you?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: I've been a fan of the Black Knight since I was five. Can I get her autograph?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: That's up to her.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do you want to sign for these young folks, Degenbrecher?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The campaign knights eagerly call out to their comrades.
A little line forms on the ice.
It is like one of the many small fan meet-and-greets on the streets of Kazimierz.
The campaign knights give Degenbrecher their cards, and Degenbrecher writes her name on them.
Enciodes chats with the knights every now and then, playing the part of a good host.
It is all very natural. No one has the slightest complaint.
Eventually, the knights leave, satisfied, and calm returns to the ice.
The campaign knights I know aren't that excitable.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Our partnership with Kazimierz has just begun. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz wouldn't have sent 'real' campaign knights.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is just the Browntails spending their own money to invite some youths over for a sightseeing trip.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And it probably took the Black Knight's name to get them to agree.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: How do you feel?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Maybe I'm no different from the Kazimierz that you hated. You're just another chip in my hands.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All of it is the same, be it your identity as the Black Knight, Kazimierz's exploitation of you, your martial strength, and your value as a soldier.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do you find this unacceptable?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I've gotten used to it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Let us once again welcome our friends from far away.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The doors of Kjerag are always open to those who come in good faith. Let us remember the friendships forged today.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Thank you for the invitation, Saintess.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You're... Muelsyse, from Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It warms me up that you still remember me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The mountains and rivers of Kjerag that I saw along the way were awfully pretty. I'm sure we'll have a great partnership.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Rhine Lab's partner is Karlan Trade, Miss Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But you are the one calling the shots in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Building a launch pad on Karlan is a big deal. Mr. Silverash has stressed the need to get the Saintess's blessing.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I have heard about this from Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Karlan is the spine and body of Kjeragandr. I must say I have reservations about such a massive project taking place there—
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Saintess, Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What is it, Kjarr?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That launch pad that they're talking about, it sends things into the sky, right?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: If they build it there...
attributes.name: Kjarr
Kjarr
attributes.content: Does it mean that I...?

attributes.name: Kjarr
attributes.content: Er, Kjeragandr, will get a few cannons on Her body?
Cannons...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjarr... do you think Kjeragandr would object?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Object? Why?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: It sounds so cool!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You should say yes!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Lisburn! What happened?
attributes.name: Beautiful Woman

attributes.content: Those wounds...
attributes.name: Beautiful Woman

attributes.content: It's nothing.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Freya, I have something important to tell you...
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: What is it, Lisburn?
attributes.name: Beautiful Woman

attributes.content: I... love...
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: 'I ♥ Snow'! The knitted words on your clothes look so nice!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: The snowy mountains are so beautiful on a fine day like this!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, uh, yeah.
attributes.name: Beautiful Woman

attributes.content: Aw damn it all!
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: The berk ran away from THAT? I should shoot him for desertion!
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Keep it down, Jack!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Did you all peep on me like this, back in the day, when I proposed to my wife?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Come now, Harold, this isn't personal. We do this to everyone who proposes.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Is Lisburn really going to propose after a fight like that?
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: What does he have to lose after a fight like that?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: She says yes, he gets to bury his bones here. She says no, he gets closure and returns to Victoria. It's going to take him the better part of a full year to recover.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You have a point.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: You idiots, why didn't you call me over to help?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Are you going to let your brother propose empty-handed? No ring, fine, but not even a flower?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's all ice and snow here. Where are you gonna find a flower?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Make an ice flower, then! What do you carry your weapons for? Nothing shows sincerity like the handmade stuff. That's what the ladies like, don't you understand?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Well, you're in a better position to understand than any of us...
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Right, Harold? Ice flower, eh? I'm sure there's someone back home who will be very interested to know.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: W-Wait! Don't you run your mouth in front of my wife!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've never given an ice flower to any woman other than Lily... it was just an example! Really!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I didn't expect to see you here.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's my job to protect the Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Same old story.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Care to spar?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: After you've fully recovered.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: We can do it after hours, if I'm still in Kjerag then.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: How many people do you have who are better than you?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I wouldn't mind making the trip myself, if there are enough of them.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You used to commentate the knight competitions?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No wonder your voice sounded familiar. Maybe I watched a match you were covering!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Thanks for the compliment. Not that I have much to write home about other than my voice!
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: I didn't expect to see the campaign knights here, though...
attributes.name: Spokesman Mob

attributes.content: The ones in silver armor? They're so cool!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I invited them here!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: And you, too, Rosalind! You're a guest of mine as well.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Enjoy the hospitality of Kjerag!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I must thank you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Thank you for accepting the invitation, and for your little gift to Mr. Mob.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It was quite helpful.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You had a plan even without my help, didn't you?;Save it, I know you always have a backup plan.

attributes.content: It would have involved more effort.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Under the circumstances, I'm plenty thankful just to speed things up by a step.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I hope you're happy with our hospitality.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Don't think you can hook me with an invitation letter next time.;Was it you who invited Rhine? I thought Rhodes Island was the extent of your manipulation.

attributes.content: Looks like you still remember our game of chess three years ago, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Our relationship has changed over the past three years. There's no need for this level of caution.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Karlan Trade invited Rhine Lab to discuss cooperation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I, Enciodes, invited you, Doctor, for the sole purpose of attending the ceremony, and nothing else.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can take part of the credit for this festive scene before us.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Come, ally.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I will be happy to be your guide, if you would like to see what Kjerag is like now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: I guess we could do worse than a shore leave.;I'll be your guest, then, so to speak.

attributes.content: One more thing.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Next time, if you want me to bring someone with me, just say it.;Are you surprised that she didn't come?

attributes.content: As an ally, I'm sure you understand what I mean.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Cliffheart is doing fine. It's just that this was on short notice, and she happened to be away from Rhodes Island.;Your sister is busy with her own business. Send the invitation earlier next time.
She'll come back to Kjerag next time.;She said she'll give you a surprise. The plural 'you'.

attributes.content: Glad to hear that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's a shame that she couldn't come on such an important occasion, but if she continues to climb, then whatever peak she reaches...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: She'll hear the wind of Karlan from the top.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...Ratatos?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You shouldn't be here now. The absence of the head of one of the three great houses at the Saintess's banquet will draw unnecessary attention.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sciurus will take care of things.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: If there's anyone who shouldn't be here at this time, it's the CTO of Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm sure that director of Rhine Lab has many things she wants to discuss with someone in a technical position.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Enciodes will take care of her needs.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We want Rhine Lab's technology, and they want Karlan's elevated terrain. Fundamentally, this is a business deal.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's more in Enciodes's domain.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I guess you're right.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm thinking that Enciodes must have had a dozen contingency plans for today's incident.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He put up a good act of being worried, though. Did it fool you?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: That's the kind of person he is. I'm not surprised.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But there's one thing that you're off the mark about, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This is the rare occasion that he didn't put up an act.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes... It's not like him. Not sufficiently profit-driven, too much risk, yet the best outcome was achieved for everyone.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You hear that, Gnosis? It's the sound of metal coming together to form a monster.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I've listened to the heavy noise of construction for long enough.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Project One is near completion, from what I've heard.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You heard right.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But for all the effort we committed, even building Kjeragandr's statue as a ruse and building the base underneath Lake Silberneherze...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: For all the time we put in, the effort it took to hide it all—
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: One battleship is all we managed to build.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: We can't hide it for long. Even if Victoria lets it go this once, the world will eventually figure out what we're doing.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: That's why we don't need to hide it on purpose.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Just try not to draw too much attention.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm sure you realize why Victoria stopped.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We must develop as much as we can now, while all the powers at work are still in balance.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This is the only way out for Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I hope it all goes as well as you say.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Speaking of which, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I heard some rumors.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Are you really going to call the Project One ship the 'Walnut'?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: That silly sister of mine came up with an interesting idea this time.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: She said that when she has her own kids, she'll tell them that this ship is their older brother.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Cute, isn't it?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Rosalind?
I'm sorry I couldn't come with you to Kjerag this time.
You took the box to the top of the mountain, didn't you?
Mamochka!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You can trust me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You went out again? The doctor told you to stay in bed!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Just taking a walk. I'm fine.
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: All this fuss over one broken bone. I'm getting suffocated, stuck in a hospital room all day.
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: That's because you weren't careful when fiddling with that jetpack...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It was fun, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: I want to try it again sometime. Did you have the chance to try out rock-climbing while you were in Kjerag?
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: No, I didn't.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You really should, next time you have a chance. It's fun.
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: I'll take you on an adventure in Sargon once my leg's healed... Sami sounds good too!
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Tatyana

attributes.content: I can't wait!
attributes.name: Tatyana
